description: A node.js implementation of Hyperledger Fabric chaincode shim, to allow endorsing peers and user-provided chaincodes to communicate with each other

name: fabric-shim

scripts.update: npm run update:clean && npm run update:copy && npm run update:pbjs && npm run update:pbts
scripts.update:clean: rimraf bundle.js bundle.d.ts protos && mkdirp protos
scripts.update:pbjs: pbjs -t static-module -p google-protos -p protos $(find google-protos protos -name "*.proto" -type f) -o bundle.js
